p: Cadmium chloride (CdCl 2) was obtained from Oxford Laboratory, Mumbai, India, and solubilized in normal saline. Acetylthiocholine iodide, adenosine, 5,5′-dithiobis, 2-nitrobenzoic acid (DTNB), and Tris-HCl were purchased from Sigma–Aldrich, St. Louis, MO, USA. All other reagents used in this study were of analytical grade and the water was glass distilled.
